1.details: Implement the easiest documentation improvements: fix wiki loading issues, update README with proper installation steps, add basic API documentation for core modules (TIXL-001 to TIXL-010)

2.content: Phase 2: Basic Code Quality & Build Warnings
2.details: Address compiler warnings and implement basic code quality improvements: fix unused variables, add proper null checks, implement basic error handling patterns (TIXL-011 to TIXL-025)

3.details: Establish comprehensive testing framework: xUnit setup, baseline test suite, visual regression testing, UI automation, code coverage, CI integration (TIXL-041 to TIXL-055)

4.details: Implement performance optimizations: frame pacing, PSO caching, I/O isolation, node graph evaluation, resource management (TIXL-021 to TIXL-040)

5.details: Implement security measures: NuGet auditing, vulnerability scanning, dependency management, access controls (TIXL-056 to TIXL-065)

6.details: User experience improvements: accessibility, UI consistency, developer tools, workflow enhancements (TIXL-066 to TIXL-085)

7.details: Community infrastructure: plugin system, contribution automation, documentation, governance (TIXL-086 to TIXL-095)

8.details: Implement advanced community and ecosystem features: community health metrics monitoring, regular content cadence planning, funding diversification strategies, licensing policy clarity, and educational partnerships program (TIXL-096 to TIXL-100)
